availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: H. P. Raines (Hopkins County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to E. A. Raines. Father of Mary F. Raines, James A. Raines, Henrietta Raines, John W. Raines, Isa J. Raines, Dowsler Raines, Thomas A. Raines, and Nancy Raines. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed Samuel Nancell as a farm laborer in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Madisonville in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 814.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, September 1863, p. 17.
